title: What is a word processor? or Tale of two sisters
creator_credit: Peter Robinson, Robert Reid, IBM (UK) and Video Arts
brief_description: A John Cleese training film which explains the principles and illustrates the nature of word processing. Shows all the aspects of office work which the processor can make quicker or easier, and provides a framework of understanding which dispels the mystery and threat surrounding this technology. Features John Cleese, Alison Steadman, Kay Stonham and Carol Hawkins. Photography by Arthur Wooster, sound by Bruce White, edited by Colin Sherman, narrated by Judi Dench, written by David Nobbs.
